description: Work orders store all information about the job performed for an account. Stores incident details, resource, expenses, tasks, communications, billing and more

Priority.description: Priority of the Work Order. To be taken into consideration while scheduling resources

Work Order Summary.description: Summarize the conversation in the email thread, identifying main points of discussion and any conclusions that were reached. Do not incorporate other general knowledge. Summary is in plain text, in complete sentences, with no markup or tags.

Primary Incident Customer Asset.description: Customer Asset related to this incident reported
enum: Heat Sensor - Smart Brew 300 - Retail Customer
Heat Sensor - Smart Brew 300 - Retail Customer
Coffee Maker LED Panel Circuit Board-simulated-device

Price List.description: Price List that controls pricing for products / services added to this work order. By default the system will use the Price List specified on the account
